ingredients: 4 cups torn day-old coarse country bread
About 1/2 cup red wine vinegar, or to taste
1/4 cup olive oil, or to taste
4 tomatoes, peeled, seeded and finely &nbsp chopped
1 cup minced fresh flat-leaf parsley, &nbsp plus sprigs for garnish
1 tsp. salt, plus more, to taste
1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper, plus more, to &nbsp taste
